Package it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameController
    Object that manages a game's life cycle, it's setup and its teardown.
    GameControllerFactory
    Object that create a new game controller.
    LobbyController
    A lobby controller object managing the life cycle of a lobby.
    LobbyState
    Interface for a generic lobby state.
    TimerListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdrenalineGameController
    GameController implementation for Adrenaline games handled by the server.
    AdrenalineGameControllerFactory  
    AdrenalineGameControllerTest  
    Config
    A configuration object mantaining all the information used by the server.
    GameOverLobbyState
    Lobby state that represents a lobby with a game that fully finished its life cycle.
    InGameLobbyState
    Lobby state that represents a lobby hosting an ongoing game.
    LobbyControllerImpl  
    LobbyRegistry  
    LobbyRegistryTest  
    ReadyLobbyState  
    ScriptedAdrenalineGameController  
    ServerInstance
    Server instance object representing the whole server, with its configuration, connected users and lobbies.
    TestAdrenalineGameController  
    TestConfig  
    TestServerInstance  
    TestTimer  
    TimedExecutor
    Object that executes a given runnable object within a certain period of time.
    TimedExecutorTest  
    Timer
    A Timer object calls methods on a given TimerListener object with time criteria.
    TimerWaitingLobbyState  
    UserGreeter
    The user greeter is an object that takes various user modules that accept new users based on different criterias.
    UserGreeterTest  
    UserRegistry
    Object that keeps all the connected users, and manages user identification.
    UserRegistryTest  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbortedException
    User by TimedExecutor class.
    InterruptExecutionException
    Thrown by TimedExecutor when the inner execution has requested to immediately return.
    InvalidConfigException
    Thrown when the read configuration does not exist or is malformed.
    InvalidStateException
    Thrown when the callee has received a message not allowed in its current state.
    TimeoutException
    Thrown when the TimedExecutor interrupts its execution due to a timeout on its timer.
